nodes.text: The ANs-5d "lock track" full-spectrum transceiver was a device produced by Fabritech. It was used along with a Melihat "Multi Imager" dedicated energy receptor and a Tana Ire electro-photo receptor to comprise a T-65B X-wing starfighters sensor system. Alternatively, the ANs-5d could be combined with two additional Fabritech components, a PTSA #PA-9r long-range phased tachyon detection array and a PTAG #PG-7u short range primary threat analysis grid to produce the sensor system. This alternate configuration was a BTL-A4 Y-wing assault starfighter/bombers main sensor system.
